character.statement: I'll need to find a way to drive those zombies away first.
One bulb is missing, and the whole string's blown out!
That's a big padlock, and I don't have a key.
I already used the bolt cutters to open the gate.
There's no point in using the bolt cutters right here.
I can't use the light bulb right here.
Thank goodness the zombie outbreak is over!
Just to be safe, I'm only eating candy from now on.
It's going to take awhile to fix all this mess.
